comment._content: An article about this visit can be found in the New York Times Archives, printed the day after on Sunday, August 13, 1911. (pdf format)

comment.author: 47576105@N02
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Memories: Capturing Experiences, and we would love to have this photo added to our dementia therapy library!
